desc:
This is a simple library for Vazkii's mods. It automates annoying parts of modding, like registering items, blocks, or models. It also features a packet system and a bunch of random shared utils.

 

Mods that use this:

  • Quark
  • Psi
  • Morph-o-Tool
  • Akashic Tome
  • Potion Fingers

 

Source Code

If you have any problems with the mod or just want to contact me, you can find me on Twitter (@Vazkii) or IRC (#vazkii on irc.esper.net).
